name: Elevator Panic!
description:
LDJam 37 Entry

Theme: One Room

Controls: Up and Down Arrow Keys, Space to Release Break

You're in an office and everyone is busy and they need to get where they're going. Luckily they've got a really neat, definitely not dangerous, totally safe elevator that will get them there quickly.

Sadly, you're the one controlling it, and who knows what you might do. Hopefully you'll try and get them to their location safely. Maybe you'll kill them. Who cares.

Score points, stay alive, all that good stuff that's in games.
